goals__remit: CO.DI is involved in the promotion of the Digital Market, to preserve European capabilities and heritage; and in the exploration of new opportunities inside the Digital Market. It has a long experince in the organization of Digital Technologies and New Media events and conferences; as well as in the realization of TV News and productions to keep informed Italian audience about European Authorities and Institutions.
